title: Determination & Findings (D&F)
required_when: contract_type in ['T&M', 'LH'] OR other specific conditions per FAR

options: Use of Other Than Sealed Bidding (FAR 6.401)

finding_text.description: State the factual basis supporting the determination

T&M_LH_required_findings: No other contract type is suitable (explain why FFP is not feasible)
The government will provide adequate surveillance to ensure efficient performance
The contractor's accounting system is adequate for T&M/LH contract administration

determination_statement.template: Based on the above findings, I hereby determine that {specific_determination} is in the best interest of the Government.

approving_official.note: Must be at or above the level specified in FAR for the type of D&F

validation_rules.rule: At least 2 findings must be documented
If d_and_f_type is T&M/LH, all three required findings must be addressed
Determination statement must specifically reference the authorized action
For T&M contracts, must describe surveillance plan for cost control
